StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCalendarDisplayItems]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @StartDateTime date.me, @EndDateTime date.me, @OrgUnitID int ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [CalendarItemID], [dbo].[CalendarItem].[CalendarItemTypeID] as CalendarItemType, [ScheduledEventID], [dbo].[ScheduledEventType].[Descrip.on] as EventTypeDescrip.on, [Loca.on], [StartDateTime], [EndDateTime], [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[IsComplete], [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[ScheduledAppointmentOutcomeID], [dbo].[CalendarItem].[RecruiterID] as RecruiterID, PersonRecruiter.[LastName] as RecruiterLastName, PersonRecruiter.[FirstName] as RecruiterFirstName, PersonRecruiter.[MiddleName] as RecruiterMiddleName, [dbo].[Rank].[Abbr] as RecruiterRank, [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[LeadID], PersonLead.[LastName] as LeadLastName, PersonLead.[FirstName] as LeadFirstName, PersonLead.[MiddleName] as LeadMiddleName, Convert(varchar(max),[Notes]) as Notes FROM [dbo].[CalendarItem], [dbo].[CalendarItemType], [dbo].[Recruiter], [dbo].[Person] PersonRecruiter, [dbo].[Rank], [dbo].[ScheduledEvent], [dbo].[ScheduledEventType], [dbo].[Lead], [dbo].[Recruit], [dbo].[Person] PersonLead
WHERE [dbo].[CalendarItem].[CalendarItemTypeID] = [dbo].[CalendarItemType].[CalendarItemTypeID] AND ([StartDateTime] >= @StartDateTime OR @StartDateTime is null) AND ([EndDateTime] <= @EndDateTime OR @EndDateTime is null) AND [dbo].[CalendarItem].[RecruiterID] = [dbo].[Recruiter].[RecruiterID] AND [dbo].[Recruiter].[Organiza.onID] in (select root from [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID UNION select root from [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] where RS = @OrgUnitID UNION select root from [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] where Region = @OrgUnitID UNION select root from [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] where HQ = @OrgUnitID) AND [dbo].[Recruiter].[PersonID] = PersonRecruiter.[PersonID] AND [dbo].[Recruiter].[RankID] = [dbo].[Rank].[RankID] AND [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[ScheduledEventTypeID] = [dbo].[ScheduledEventType].[ScheduledEventTypeID] AND [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[CalendarItemEventID] = [dbo].[CalendarItem].[CalendarItemID] AND [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[LeadID] = [dbo].[Lead].[LeadID] AND [dbo].[Lead].[RecruitID] = [dbo].[Recruit].[RecruitID] AND [dbo].[Recruit].[PersonID] = PersonLead.[PersonID]
UNION
SELECT [CalendarItemID], [dbo].[CalendarItem].[CalendarItemTypeID] as CalendarItemType, [ScheduledEventID], [dbo].[FollowUpAc.on].[Descrip.on] as EventTypeDescrip.on, [Loca.on], [StartDateTime], [EndDateTime], NULL, NULL, [dbo].[CalendarItem].[RecruiterID] as RecruiterID, PersonRecruiter.[LastName] as RecruiterLastName, PersonRecruiter.[FirstName] as RecruiterFirstName, PersonRecruiter.[MiddleName] as RecruiterMiddleName, [dbo].[Rank].[Abbr] as RecruiterRank, [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[LeadID], PersonLead.[LastName] as LeadLastName, PersonLead.[FirstName] as LeadFirstName, PersonLead.[MiddleName] as LeadMiddleName, Convert(varchar(max),[Notes]) as Notes FROM [dbo].[CalendarItem], [dbo].[CalendarItemType], [dbo].[Recruiter], [dbo].[Person] PersonRecruiter, [dbo].[Rank], [dbo].[ScheduledEvent], [dbo].[FollowUpAc.on], [dbo].[Lead], [dbo].[Recruit], [dbo].[Person] PersonLead WHERE [dbo].[CalendarItem].[CalendarItemTypeID] = [dbo].[CalendarItemType].[CalendarItemTypeID] AND ([StartDateTime] >= @StartDateTime OR @StartDateTime is null) AND ([EndDateTime] <= @EndDateTime OR @EndDateTime is null) AND [dbo].[CalendarItem].[RecruiterID] = [dbo].[Recruiter].[RecruiterID] AND [dbo].[Recruiter].[Organiza.onID] in (select root from [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID UNION select root from [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] where RS = @OrgUnitID UNION select root from [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] where Region = @OrgUnitID UNION select root from [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] where HQ = @OrgUnitID) AND [dbo].[Recruiter].[PersonID] = PersonRecruiter.[PersonID] AND [dbo].[Recruiter].[RankID] = [dbo].[Rank].[RankID] AND [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[FollowUpAc.onID] = [dbo].[FollowUpAc.on].[FollowUpAc.onID] AND [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[CalendarItemAc.onID] = [dbo].[CalendarItem].[CalendarItemID] AND [dbo].[ScheduledEvent].[LeadID] = [dbo].[Lead].[LeadID] AND [dbo].[Lead].[RecruitID] = [dbo].[Recruit].[RecruitID] AND [dbo].[Recruit].[PersonID] = PersonLead.[PersonID]
